CustomField.description: Specifies the asynchronous processing behavior NPSP will use to create the first installment Opportunity for Recurring Donations. The default is Synchronous. Other options are Asynchronous and Asynchronous_When_Bulk.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies how NPSP will create the first installment Opportunity for Recurring Donations. The default is Synchronous.
CustomField.label: Installment Opportunity Async Behavior
